items.sentence: Tom went to the counter and bought us both a drink.
Tom will help us load the furniture onto the truck.
Tom will never be able to do that without our help.
Tom will remember this weekend as long as he lives.
Are you sure Tom will let us sleep in his basement?
Tom doesn\'t want Mary to go to Boston without him.
Tom doesn\'t want his parents to know he got drunk.
Tom doesn\'t want to discuss the problem with Mary.
Why haven\'t you told Tom that he owes 300 dollars?
We can\'t reach Tom by phone, so send him an email.
Didn\'t you know Tom was going to Boston with Mary?
Didn\'t you know that Tom had a house in Australia?
This is the kind of music that I like to listen to.
This is the shortcut that I usually take to school.
This is the third time Tom has been late this week.
This kind of weather makes me want to stay indoors.
Why don\'t you just tell me what you want me to do?
Tom didn\'t say what he did that made you so angry.
I\'ve been playing the guitar since I was thirteen.
Please ask Tom if he can spare another few minutes.
